channel.title: Need a new graphics card
channel.description:
Well basically I need a new graphics card because mine is terrible but the rest of my pc specs. are pretty good/decent.
Processor AMD Athlon 64 X2 3 GHz Chipset What is "Chipset"? NVIDIA GeForce 6150 SE Installed Memory 3 GB (DDR2 SDRAM) Operating System What is "Operating System"? Microsoft Windows Vista Home Premium Processor Processor Type What is "Processor Type"? AMD Athlon 64 X2 Processor Speed What is "Processor Speed"? 3 GHz Processor Manufacturer AMD Motherboard Video Output Interface PCI Express Memory RAM Technology DDR2 SDRAM Installed RAM What is "Installed RAM"? 3 GB Installed Cache Memory 2 MB Technical Features Expansion Slots PCI Express x16 x 1 • PCI x 1 • PCI Express x1 x 2 Hard Drive Hard Drive Capacity What is "Hard Drive Capacity"? 320 GB
Now I was thinking about upgrading to [url=http://www.bestbuy.com/site/olspage.jsp?skuId=8968138&st=nVidia+geforce+9800&lp=2&type=product&cp=1&id=1217029964973]this[/url]
But I'm not sure if it'd work with my computer. I just need a good graphics card for $150 [usd] or under that'd work with my pc and have good fps and all of that.
I don't know if you guys need any other information.. so if you do just tell me how to find it and I'll post it.
Thanks in advance.
[I plan on installing it myself]
I was wondering if this would work with my p.c. and if I have enough power supply

item.title: Need a new graphics card
item.dc:creator: @chrisn2323 chrisn2323

@chrisn2323 wrote:

upgrade, get ati 4870 over both of those cards anyway

item.title: Need a new graphics card
item.dc:creator: @cows_be_sacred cows_be_sacred
item.description:
@cows_be_sacred wrote:

[quote=“la­wl, post:13, topic:295648”]they are both compatible if you hav a pci express slot.
only issue might be power consumption[/quote]
Yeah that’s what I’m worried about. Take a look at this http://forums.nvidia.com/index.php?showtopic=94409, has same pc as me and people are saying he needs a new pcu.

I do have 2 PCIE slots anyways.

Edit: Powers only 300Watts. Would that suffice for one of those cards or do I need an upgrade?

Read full topic

only issue might be power consumption

item.dc:creator: @cows_be_sacred cows_be_sacred
item.description:
@cows_be_sacred wrote:

[quote=“la­wl, post:11, topic:295648”]Original Price: $409.99
You Save: $253.00

thats bs, the 9800gtx is better in performance than the 8800gts[/quote]
That’s when it came out in 2007

Edit: Can somebody tell me if any of these cards are compatible with my pc

My Pc

Graphic Cards
Graphic Card 1
Graphic card 2

Are any of those two compatibable and run smooth with my pc?

Read full topic

item.title: Need a new graphics card
item.dc:creator: @cows_be_sacred cows_be_sacred
item.description:
@cows_be_sacred wrote:

[quote=“chrisn2323, post:8, topic:295648”][quote author=cows_be_sacred link=topic=391645.msg2916533#msg2916533 date=1250482931]
Uh how can I check?
[/quote]
read the manual that comes with it[/quote]
I found out that it’s a PCI Express [PCIE]

So that means it can run that graphics card, now I’m just wondering if my pc has enough power.

Edit: I have found another card and I’m debating between This or this

The costs are fine I’m just wondering if my computer has enough power to run them. It seems the 9800 takes less power even though it is larger but I’m not sure.

[I’m going towards the 8800 as it is really good for graphics, and it can take crysis at almost full]

Read full topic

item.title: Need a new graphics card
item.dc:creator: @cows_be_sacred cows_be_sacred
item.description:
@cows_be_sacred wrote:

Well basically I need a new graphics card because mine is terrible but the rest of my pc specs. are pretty good/decent.

Processor AMD Athlon 64 X2 3 GHz
Chipset What is “Chipset”? NVIDIA GeForce 6150 SE
Installed Memory 3 GB (DDR2 SDRAM)
Operating System What is “Operating System”? Microsoft Windows Vista Home Premium
Processor
Processor Type What is “Processor Type”? AMD Athlon 64 X2
Processor Speed What is “Processor Speed”? 3 GHz
Processor Manufacturer AMD
Motherboard
Video Output Interface PCI Express
Memory
RAM Technology DDR2 SDRAM
Installed RAM What is “Installed RAM”? 3 GB
Installed Cache Memory 2 MB
Technical Features
Expansion Slots PCI Express x16 x 1 • PCI x 1 • PCI Express x1 x 2
Hard Drive
Hard Drive Capacity What is “Hard Drive Capacity”? 320 GB

Now I was thinking about upgrading to this

But I’m not sure if it’d work with my computer. I just need a good graphics card for $150 [usd] or under that’d work with my pc and have good fps and all of that.

I don’t know if you guys need any other information… so if you do just tell me how to find it and I’ll post it.

Thanks in advance.

[I plan on installing it myself]

I was wondering if this would work with my p.c.
and if I have enough power supply
